scripts.startwithapi: swa start --verbose info --api-location ./api --port 4280 http://localhost:7070 --run="npm exec vite dev -- --port 7070" --open
scripts.startwithliveapi: swa start --verbose info --api-location IGNORED --api-devserver-url https://api.ivorytower.com --port 4280 http://localhost:7070 --run="npm exec vite dev -- --port 7070" --open
scripts.startwithvs: swa start --verbose info --api-location http://localhost:7071 --port 4280 http://localhost:7070 --run="npm exec vite dev -- --port 7070"
